mapper.insert: INSERT INTO estimate (cod, client_cod, employee_cod, price) SELECT CONCAT('est', LPAD(COALESCE(MAX(SUBSTRING(cod, 4)), 0) + 1, 3, '0')), #{clientCod}, #{employeeCod}, #{price} FROM estimate;
mapper.select: SELECT e.estimate_cod as cod , e.num, e2.est_date , p.cod as productcod , p.prodname, e.qty, e.total, c.name as clientname, e2.employee_cod as employeecod , e3.name as empname, d.name as deptname, p.unitprice FROM estimatedetail e LEFT JOIN product p ON e.product_cod = p.cod LEFT JOIN estimate e2 ON e.estimate_cod = e2.cod LEFT JOIN client c ON e2.client_cod = c.cod left join employee e3 on e2.employee_cod = e3.cod left join department d on e3.department_cod = d.cod WHERE estimate_cod = #{cod}
